description: This notification is sent when the device reports an Alert
Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) event.

Summary.eval: ($v12==2) ? 'PM TCA cleared on $v4 interface $v5' : (($v12==3) ? 'PM TCA occurred on $v4 interface $v5' : 'PM TCA event on $v4 interface $v5, state is $v12')

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 4 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceName s EXAMPLE1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceInterfaceType i 1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceInterfaceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaUnits i 1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaBasisValue C 9999 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaBoundaryValue C 9999 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkType i 1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkStats b 0 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkValue C 9999 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaState i 3

$SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 1 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceName s EXAMPLE1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceInterfaceType i 1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceInterfaceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaUnits i 1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaBasisValue C 9999 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaBoundaryValue C 9999 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkType i 1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkStats b 0 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkValue C 9999 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaState i 2

$SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 9 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceName s EXAMPLE2 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceInterfaceType i 1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceInterfaceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaUnits i 1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaBasisValue C 9999 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaBoundaryValue C 9999 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkType i 1 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkStats b 0 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkValue C 9999 CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaState i 1

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Name for the PM instance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceName

description: Interface type associated with the PM instance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceInterfaceType

description: Interface name associated with the PM instance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmInstanceInterfaceName

description: The value of cienaCesPmAlertTcaUnits that was in use during
the last Alert TCA for the PM instance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaUnits

description: The alert basis value that was in place when the last Alert
TCA event occurred. This refers to the value of
cienaCesPmAlertTcaBasis when the last Alert TCA occurred.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaBasisValue

description: The threshold boundary value which was reached or exceeded
causing the last Alert TCA. This refers to the value of
cienaCesPmAlertTcaBoundaryValue when the last Alert TCA
occurred.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaBoundaryValue

description: The type of watermark that was used in the logic that caused
the last Alert TCA event for the PM instance. This refers to
the watermark value reported by the
cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkValue object.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkType

description: The statistic(s) which were used by the Alert TCA feature to
establish the watermark value identified by the
cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkValue object. This refers
to the value of cienaCesPmAlertTcaHighWatermarkStats when the
Alert TCA occurred.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkStats

description: The watermark value that was used in the logic that caused the
last Alert TCA event for the PM instance. This refers to the
value of cienaCesPmAlertTcaHighWatermarkValue when the last
Alert TCA occurred.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaWatermarkValue

description: The alert state that was in place during the last Alert TCA.
Alert TCA events occur whenever there are changes to the Alert
TCA state of the PM Instance. This object indicates whether
the last Alert TCA represented the PM instance having entered
the Alert TCA state by indicating a value of alert. This
object indicates whether the last Alert TCA represented the PM
instance having exited the Alert TCA state by indicating a
value of normal.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PM::cienaCesPmAlertTcaLastTcaState
